heading: "Changes to making a referral"
text: "We have improved the functionality of 3 types of referrals in Refer and monitor an intervention..."
link_text: "Read more about the changes to these referrals"

heading: "Sharing better information about session delivery"
text: "You can now give more information about the SAA and delivery sessions..."
link_text: "Read more about changes to session feedback"

heading: "Helping to reduce emails to probation practitioners"
text: "You can now add a case note without it sending an email to the probation practitioner."
link_text: "Read more about changes to case notes emails"

heading: "Recent changes to Refer and monitor an intervention"
text: "We have improved the functionality of tabs on the Refer and Monitor dashboard to provide a clearer view of referral status and added automatic approval to action plans"

heading: "Recent changes to Refer and monitor an intervention"
text: "You can now see the history of all SAAs
link_text: ICAs and sessions rescheduled before the session took place. There is a change to the CSV report. There are new additional prompts for the probation practitioner to consider in providing further information about the referral."
